title: MarketWatch: Making Sense Of The Latest Student Loan News
description: Join Jillian Berman, MarketWatch's deputy enterprise editor and Betsy Mayotte, the founder of the Institute of Student Loan Advisors for a discussion of the latest student loan news, and they will share their expertise on the payment pause, debt forgiveness and any other student loan-related questions on your mind.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Join Jillian Berman, MarketWatch's deputy enterprise editor and Betsy Mayotte, the founder of the Institute of Student Loan Advisors for a discussion of the latest student loan news, and they will share their expertise on the payment pause, debt forgiveness and any other student loan-related questions on your mind.
content:encoded: Join Jillian Berman, MarketWatch's deputy enterprise editor and Betsy Mayotte, the founder of the Institute of Student Loan Advisors for a discussion of the latest student loan news, and they will share their expertise on the payment pause, debt forgiveness and any other student loan-related questions on your mind.
